parts.text: Bidco.ltd is a B2B SaaS company selling a cloud-hosted project management platform to mid-sized enterprises in finance and healthcare. We have 120 employees and offices in the US, India and Kenya. Please classify us under the SASB SICS taxonomy

Industry Classification under SASB SICS:

• Sector: Technology & Communications  
• Industry: Software & IT Services  

Your primary business activity (providing cloud-hosted software/IT services), product (project management platform), customer base (mid-sized enterprises in finance and healthcare), and delivery model (B2B SaaS) align with the Software & IT Services industry in the Technology & Communications sector.

args.request: Bidco.ltd is a B2B SaaS company selling a cloud-hosted project management platform to mid-sized enterprises in finance and healthcare. We have 120 employees and offices in the US, India and Kenya. Please classify us under the SASB SICS taxonomy.

parts.text: Classify our business. We’re a fast-growing tech company.

To classify your company under the SASB SICS taxonomy, I need a bit more detail about your business. Could you please describe:
1. Your main business activity (e.g., what you do day-to-day)  
2. The specific products or services you offer  
3. Who your customers are (market or end users)  
4. How you deliver your offering (business model or distribution)  

With those details, I can determine the appropriate sector and industry.

Classify our business: We develop cloud-based customer relationship management (CRM) software for small and mid-sized businesses (SMBs). Our platform helps companies track leads, manage contacts, and automate sales workflows. We operate on a subscription-based SaaS model and deliver services exclusively through our website and mobile app

Based on your description, your company falls under:  
• Sector: Technology & Communications  
• Industry: Software & IT Services  

This classification reflects your core activity—developing and delivering SaaS-based CRM software via web and mobile channels to SMB customers.

args.request: We develop cloud-based customer relationship management (CRM) software for small and mid-sized businesses (SMBs). Our platform helps companies track leads, manage contacts, and automate sales workflows. We operate on a subscription-based SaaS model and deliver services exclusively through our website and mobile app. Please classify our business under SASB SICS taxonomy.

parts.text: lassify our company: We design and manufacture solar panels for rooftop and industrial use. We install and maintain the systems ourselves.

Your company’s SASB SICS classification is:  
• Sector: Renewable Resources & Alternative Energy  
• Industry: Solar Technology & Project Developers  

This reflects your activities of designing, manufacturing, installing, and maintaining solar panel systems.

args.request: We design and manufacture solar panels for rooftop and industrial use. We also install and maintain the systems ourselves. Please classify under the SASB SICS taxonomy.
